# clipContents

**Type Property**

An option that enables the clipping feature.

## Declaration

```swift
static let clipContents: PortalComponent.Options
```

## Discussion

If this option is in the option set, the user-defined geometry for [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/clippingMode-swift.property] clips the contents within the portal world.
title: clipContents
